name: UFGAtmosphereUpdater
comment: Exists both in EditorEngine and GameEngine, encapsulates the interpolation ExponentialHeightFog

methods.name: Tick
methods.comment: Update the value of the height fog in each world

methods.name: ApplyFogSettings
methods.comment: Apply the fog settings to the current world

methods.name: InterpolateFogSettings
methods.comment: Interpolate in src settings into destination, when alpha is 1, then take entire src

methods.name: InterpolateSkySphereSettings
methods.comment: Interpolate in src settings into destination, when alpha is 1, then take entire src

methods.name: ShouldUpdateWorld
methods.comment: returns true if we should update the given world

properties.name: mActiveWorlds
properties.comment: The worlds we want to affect
